Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Tavistock Hotel, you'll be centrally located in London, steps from University of London and minutes from Russell Square. This hotel is close to London Zoo and St. Paul's Cathedral.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 395 guestrooms. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Tavistock Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, a safe deposit box at the front desk, and an elevator (lift).


Check-in time starts at 3:00 PM Check-out time is 12:00 PM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Tavistock Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the 395 guestrooms. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.

With a stay at Tavistock Hotel, you'll be centrally located in London, steps from University of London and minutes from Russell Square. This hotel is close to London Zoo and St. Paul's Cathedral.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

University of London - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Russell Square - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
British Library - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
The British Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
St George’s, Bloomsbury - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
BT Tower - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Opera House - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
London Palladium Theatre - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
KoKo London - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Covent Garden Market - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Leicester Square - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
London Coliseum - 1.6 km / 1 mi
King's College London - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Royal Academy of Music - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Piccadilly Circus - 1.6 km / 1 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 12.6 km / 7.8 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 23 km / 14.3 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 41 km / 25.5 mi
London (LTN-Luton) - 43 km / 26.7 mi
London (STN-Stansted) - 48.8 km / 30.3 mi

The preferred airport for Tavistock Hotel is London (LHR-Heathrow).

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
